name: Day 1 // Flowers
description:
A short bitsy i made as part of a project of doing 31 bitsy games during october 2018 (which I probably won't finish).
As with most people doing inktober i have prompts for each day , for this game they are :

-Overgrown ruins

-Aconite

-Toxic

-Using this sprite : https://twitter.com/SpritesByBitsy/status/1046734313725861889

-And "swimming god of the east, bravely humming a song" from https://twitter.com/all_the_gods

(If you can't move clicking on the game should solve it and also you can interact more than once with things)
